author: Hemant Mehta
title: The Story of King David (As Explained By An Atheist Who Actually Read the Bible): Part Two
text:
« An Evangelical Icon’s Son Left the Faith; Now They’ve Written a Book Discussing Their Differences About Hemant Mehta 
Hemant Mehta is the editor of Friendly Atheist, appears on the Atheist Voice channel on YouTube, and co-hosts the uniquely-named Friendly Atheist Podcast . You can read much more about him here .
